intro: Hedyotis sariganensis, commonly known as the Sarigan bedstraw, is a flowering plant native to the Philippines. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. Hedyotis sariganensis is notable for its limited distribution and is considered a rare species within its native range.
